thobe.widgets.splitPanel

Class SPFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • thobe.widgets.splitPanel.SPFrame
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SPFrameContainer, SPSubFrame

    public abstract class SPFrame
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class representing the component of the composite design-pattern. Using this class a tree can be build that represents the hierarchy of the subframes of a SplitPanel.
    Author:
    Thomas Obenaus

    • Constructor Detail

      • SPFrame

        public SPFrame(int id,
       boolean firstChild)
        Ctor
        Parameters:
        firstChild - - Indicates if this node is the first child of a SPFrameContainer. Note: Yes the root has no parent and is therefore not a child of any other SPFrameContainer, but for this special node this parameter should be true.
        id - - id of this frame
